name: giu
description: A collection of React components and utilities
author: Guillermo Grau Panea

scripts.compile: rm -rf ./lib && mkdir lib && babel --out-dir lib --ignore "**/__mocks__/**","**/__tests__/**" src && cp src/*.css lib && cp src/components/*.css lib/components && cp src/inputs/*.css lib/inputs && cp -r src/fonts lib/fonts && cp src/api.js.flow lib/
scripts.build: node package && npm run lint && npm run flow && npm run compile && npm run docs && npm run buildExamplesSsr && npm run xxl
scripts.buildExamplesDev: npm run buildExamplesCopy && cp examples/*.html docs/ && webpack --config examples/webpackConfig.js --progress --display-chunks --watch
scripts.buildExamplesSsr: npm run buildExamplesCopy && cross-env NODE_ENV=production SERVER_SIDE_RENDERING=true webpack --config examples/webpackConfig.js --progress --display-chunks -p
scripts.buildExamplesSsrDev: npm run buildExamplesCopy && cross-env SERVER_SIDE_RENDERING=true webpack --config examples/webpackConfig.js --progress --display-chunks --watch
scripts.buildExamplesCopy: cp -r examples/stylesheets docs/ && cp examples/favicon.ico docs/
scripts.testCovFull: npm run testCovPrepare && npm run testDev && npm run testProd && npm run testCovReport
scripts.testCovFast: npm run testCovPrepare && npm run testDev && npm run testCovReport
